title: Herbal Allies for Cold and Flu w/ Cantos de La Tierra
desc: Berenice will also have pomadas, lip balm, and earring for sale at the event. ? About Berenice: Berenice is the visionary of Cantos De La Tierra, a full spectrum doula, community based healer, reiki practitioner, restorative bodyworker, medicine maker, herbalist in training, and health educator. Find out more about Berenice's work by visiting her website ~ www.berenicedimas.com and her FB page Cantos De La Tierra? ? About Mujeres de Maiz: Mujeres de Maiz (women of the corn) is a women of color spiritual ARTivist collective based in East LA since 1997. Their mission is to bring together and empower diverse women and girls through the creation of community spaces that provide holistic wellness through education, art programming, exhibition and publishing. www.mujeresdemaiz.co
